description: The Integrated Agriculture Training Centre Scheme in Meghalaya provides training to farmers on modern agricultural practices to enhance productivity and sustainability.
key_features: Training on crop management, livestock, and horticulture
Focus on organic farming and local crops

criteria: Farmers and rural youth in Meghalaya
Preference for small and marginal farmers

steps: Contact local agriculture department or training centre

special_notes: Training tailored to Meghalaya’s agro-climatic conditions
